results.title: SUPERVISOR DE MÍDIA PAGA
results.description: AMARO is seeking an experienced and razor sharp Paid Media Supervisor to scale our customer acquisition efforts and increase conversion with our existing user base. You will report to the Head of Performance Marketing and operationally be in charge of planning, running and measuring all paid media efforts at AMARO. Responsibilities: - Be in charge of the day-to-day planning and running of paid media at AMARO - Plan, structure and execute all campaigns across channels: across channels: search, d…
